name: Graph Paper Adventures
description:
Notes:

If the controller is not detected by the browser, you could try pressing some buttons on the controller to try and see if it shows up in the player assignment screen (after the title screen).

Classes:

ClassAbilityDescriptionCooldownWarriorBlockPrevents damage (depending on the direction of the incoming hit)2 secondsArcherBackdashInstantly teleports a few spaces behind the character5 seconds

Controls:

ActionKeyboard/MousePlayStationXboxMovementWASDLeft JoystickLeft JoystickAiming/Facing DirectionMouseRight JoystickRight JoystickRunSpacebarCrossAAttackLeft ClickR1Right BumperAbilityRight ClickL1Left Bumper
